title: MD SUHEL branding, blue theme background, and header logo

requirements.summary: Replace existing global branding with "MD SUHEL" in header, footer, and HTML document title.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text displays "MD SUHEL" instead of the current name.
Footer copyright line displays "© {year} MD SUHEL. All rights reserved."
The browser tab/document title includes "MD SUHEL" (update frontend/index.html).

file_operations.description: Update the header brand/title text from the current name to "MD SUHEL" (keep existing navigation and sign-in/out behavior unchanged).
Update the footer copyright text to "© {year} MD SUHEL. All rights reserved." while preserving the existing attribution link.
Update the HTML document <title> so the browser tab includes "MD SUHEL".

requirements.summary: Apply a blue background theme across the app while maintaining readable contrast and consistent card/control styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The app background is clearly blue on the main pages (application form, my applications, application detail).
Text and form controls remain accessible/legible with sufficient contrast against the new blue background.
No layout regressions: header, main content, and footer still render with proper spacing and separation.

file_operations.description: Adjust the global theme CSS variables (notably --background and related tokens) so the overall page background is visibly blue while keeping cards, borders, and foreground text at accessible contrast in both light and dark modes.

Ensure the top-level layout continues to apply the global background utility (bg-background) and that header/main/footer spacing/separation remains consistent with the new blue theme (no new routes/pages).

requirements.summary: Add a generated static logo to the header next to the "MD SUHEL" brand text using a public asset path under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A logo image is rendered in the header adjacent to the "MD SUHEL" brand text.
The logo is loaded from a static asset path under frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).
The logo maintains good alignment and sizing on both mobile and desktop header layouts.

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset file at the required static location: frontend/public/assets/generated/md-suhel-logo.dim_256x256.png.

Render the static logo image (loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated/md-suhel-logo.dim_256x256.png) next to the "MD SUHEL" brand text, with responsive sizing/alignment that works on mobile and desktop header layouts.
